ch.hslu.livingWithLightColors.BusinessLogic.Interfaces

Interface ILightController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhilipsLightController

    public interface ILightController
    Controls the lights.
    Author:
    Curdin Banzer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the light controller.
      boolean isBridgeConnected()
      Checks, if the connection to the bridge is established.
      void open()
      Prepares the light controller.
      void setBrightness(int brightness)
      Changes the brightness of all lights.
      void setColor(PhilipsHSBLightSetting settings)
      Changes the color of all lights.
      void turnOff()
      Turns all lights off.
      void turnOn()
      Turns all lights on.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open()
        Prepares the light controller. After that the lights can be controlled.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the light controller. After that, no lights can be controlled any more.

      • setColor

        void setColor(PhilipsHSBLightSetting settings)
        Changes the color of all lights.
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings, which the lights should overtake.

      • setBrightness

        void setBrightness(int brightness)
        Changes the brightness of all lights.
        Parameters:
        brightness - The brightness, which the lights should overtake.

      • turnOn

        void turnOn()
        Turns all lights on.

      • turnOff

        void turnOff()
        Turns all lights off.

      • isBridgeConnected

        boolean isBridgeConnected()
        Checks, if the connection to the bridge is established.
        Returns:
        true if connection established, false if not.
